pages.text: Deklamuyutʹ dlya nykh istoriya Noah. Vin skazav yoho lyudyam, "O moyi lyudy, yakshcho vy znakhodyte moyu pozytsiyu ta moyu nahaduyuchu vam BOZHYKH vidkryttiv nadto bahato dlya vas, todi ya stavlyu moyu doviru u BOHU. Vy musyte pryyikhaty razom z vashymy lideramy, pohodzhuyetesya na zaklyuchnomu rishenni sered sebe, todi dayte meni znaty tse mittyevo
Yakshcho vy prohanyayete, todi ya ne poprosyv vas dlya budʹ-yakoyi zarplaty. Moya zarplata prybuvaye z BOHA. YA buv nakazanyy shchob buty submitter

Vony vidkhylyly yoho ta, otzhe, my vryatuvaly yoho ta tsey khto pryyednalysya do yoho u ark; my zrobyly yim inheritors. Ta my potopyly tsi khto vidkhylyly nashi vidkryttya. Prymitka naslidky; vony buly poperedzheni

Todi my poslaly pislya kur'yeriv yoho do yikhnikh lyudey, ta vony pokazaly yim yasni dokazy. Ale vony ne musyatʹ viryty v yaki vony vidkhylyly ranishe. My takym chynom opechatuyemo serdenʹka porushnykiv
Todi my poslaly pislya nykh Moses ta Aaron Pharaoh ta yoho hrupa, z nashymy dokazamy. Ale vony povernulysya zukhvali; ta porushuvaly lyudey
Koly pravda prybula yim z nas, vony skazaly, "Tse ye ochevydno mahichne
Moses skazaly, tsi yak vy opysuyete pravdu koly yomu prybuvaye do vas? Tse zacharuvannya? Yak budʹ-yaki charivnyky mozhutʹ perevazhaty
Vony skazaly, vy prybuly vidvesty nas z shcho my znayshly nashykh batʹkiv roblyachi, ta shchob dosyahnuly pozytsiy prominence dlya sebe? My nikoly ne pryyednayemosʹ do vas tomu shcho viruyuchi
